name: Qian's Aquarium
description:
Qian's Aquarium

In this game, you will be a cat that owns an aquarium. Manage your aquarium, to get money, try go fishing! There will be different types of fish you can capture in the ocean, drag them to your boat.  You can also trade and buy from the store, try to get more money in order to unlock rarer fish! Try clicking to interact with your fish too, they will give you some treasure. (PS: Be careful to keep your fish in your fish tank, they might try to escape!)

Interact: Right click

Drag fish: Left click

Go to ocean: G

Go to fish tank: B

Move fishing rod: WASD

Instructions: I
